thread.title: Bollywood celebs watch a Broadway musical
thread.title_full: Bollywood celebs watch a Broadway musical - Entertainment

author: The Centerstage Team
title: Bollywood celebs watch a Broadway musical
text:
Mumbai welcomed the musical version of a classic French fairytale which has had a staggering 13-year run on the Broadway scene.

Emraan Hashmi with wife, Parveen Shahani and son, Ayaan 
The gala event was attended by the crème de la crème of tinseltown, some of whom brought their children along to witness the magic unfold on celluloid.

Farah Khan with her kids Anya, Czar and Diva  
We spotted Emraan Hashmi, Vidya Balan, Dia Mirza, Tabu and Nimrat Kaur.

Madhur Bhandarkar, Renu Namboodiri and daughter Siddhi 
The story was brought to life in a larger-than-life manner with extravagant stage design, talented performers and mesmerising costumes.

Mandira Bedi, Raj Kaushal and son Vir 
More Photos: Bollywood celebs at the premiere of 'Beauty and the Beast'
